meanings.definition: Successfully bring about or reach (a desired objective or result) by effort, skill, or courage.
meanings.sent1: She worked hard to achieve her dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent2: With determination, you can achieve anything you set your mind to.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to achieve the acorn at the top of the tree but kept slipping.
meanings.sent4: His dedication helped him achieve new heights in his career.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner pushed herself to achieve the finish line.

meanings.definition: Reach or attain (a desired objective, level, or result) by effort, skill, or courage.
meanings.sent1: After years of hard work, she finally achieved her goal of owning a business.
meanings.sent2: Students can achieve good grades by studying regularly.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to achieve the toy mouse on the top shelf but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: Through perseverance, he achieved success in his chosen field.
meanings.sent5: The artist's masterpiece achieved worldwide recognition.
